product_name: Sevin Insect Killer
review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I wanted to wait a couple of weeks before I actually reviewed this product. In my opinion, it takes a couple of weeks at least to be able to tell if something like this is working. When the weather first got warmer, I noticed the usual, small bugs (mostly ants) crawling all over the porch in front of the house, and the patio area in the back yard. I did apply it twice, but I waited for another week before I applied the second dose, as it states to only use no more than 10 times per season. I noticed a difference with the first treatment, but an even better difference with the second treatment. I dont see all of the ants and small bugs that I did before and because I sprayed around the plants, I have noticed that there have been no issues with bugs on my plants. the product is easy to use, just spray and go and let it work! Id highly recommend this product.

review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] GardenTech Sevin Insect Killer Ready to Use 1.33Gal was easy to use and very efficient at killing the bugs in my garden. I like the spray handle since I can target bugs that were under the leaves of my eggplants or ants on the ground without having to spray areas that dont need treatment like my basil plant. The instructions say it is safe to use on your vegetables from 1 day before harvest for things like broccoli, and brussel sprouts, 5 days for tomatoes, 14 days for onions and 21 days for corn.
